extracted-table.table-caption: The significance (p-value of a two-sample t-test) of group comparison results (APOE ε4 carriers vs non-carriers) using six network measures from three types of brain networks

caption.p: The significance (p-value of a two-sample t-test) of group comparison results (APOE ε4 carriers vs non-carriers) using six network measures from three types of brain networks

table-wrap-foot.p: The three types of brain networks include functional connectivity networks (FC), structural connectivity networks (SC), and the networks constructed using our proposed method (Proposed). The six network measures include local efficiency (LE), betweenness (BET), global efficiency (GE), clustering coefficient (CCO), and two PH measurements (PH-0 and PH-1)
